name: Craigville Beach
description: A popular, expansive beach with soft sand and gentle waves, perfect for families and swimming.

name: Loop Beach
description: A serene, protected beach with calm waters, ideal for families and kayaking enthusiasts.

name: Ropes Beach
description: A charming, secluded beach known for its calm waters and scenic views of Cotuit Bay.

name: Sandy Neck Beach
description: A six-mile-long barrier beach with diverse ecosystems, perfect for off-road vehicle enthusiasts and nature lovers.

name: Kalmus Beach
description: A windsurfing paradise with strong breezes and calm waters, also great for kiteboarding and swimming.

name: Veterans Park Beach
description: A family-friendly beach with calm waters, a playground, and picnic areas, offering beautiful views of Lewis Bay.

name: Sea Street Beach
description: A small, quiet beach perfect for locals and visitors seeking a peaceful seaside retreat in Hyannis.
